Sequence Information.Peptide Name: At-AFP1 (A thaliana antifungal peptide 1; natural AMPs; defensins; XXQ, UCSS1a; plants; 4S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification: N-terminus is pyroglutamate.Activity: low salt medium A: active against A. brassicola (IC50 10 ug/ml), B. cinerea (IC50 3.9 ug/ml), F. culmorum (IC50 3 ug/ml), F. oxysporum f.sp. lycopersici (IC50 3 ug/ml), P. oryzae (IC50 0.25 ug/ml), and V. dahliae (IC50 1.5 ug/ml). Activity and Seq updated 2/2023.
Literature Information.Author: Terras FR, Torrekens S, Van Leuven F, Osborn RW, Vanderleyden J, Cammue BP, Broekaert WF.1993
Literature Information.Title: A new family of basic cysteine-rich plant antifungal proteins from Brassicaceae species
